page.title: 11 SUNDAY SERVICE
page.content: We are a Christian family and so every Sunday we attend Church and go to the Salvation Army in Staines. In the morning at 10.00 there is a Sunday School for the children and at the sametime the band goes to a street near the Hall and conducts an open air meeting. After this there is a main meeting in the Hall at 11.00. This concludes at about midday. After lunch there is an afternoon Sunday School at 2.30 and again the band goes out for an 'open-air'. Twice a month a Praise meeting is held at 3.30 which usually lasts for about an hour. The evening meeting begins at 6pm with the band sometimes going to Ashford Hospital beforehand. After the meeting at around 8pm a group of us aged between 14-25 go around to someone's house for coffee and to relax.
